channel.title: 2 minutes
channel.description: Anyone got like 2 minutes and teamviewer to help me figure out which ip I need to change so my friend can join my client? He downloaded it from me. The login works, it just says error connecting to server.

item.title: 2 minutes
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

The ip in your source should be the ip of the computer (not recommended) or your no-ip address. The client ip should be the same as the ip in the source, so they connect to each other.

Read full topic
